entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Creston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:38 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Creston 1:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 36 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -17.0°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
